summary: Fans represents a group of dedicated enthusiasts who actively support and engage with their interests. In the context of the course "Vote With Your Feet," it suggests that fans can leverage their collective power to influence change. This concept extends beyond traditional fandom, encouraging strategic thinking, tactical action, and creative problem-solving to express values and make impactful choices. Fans are seen as potential activists who can use their passion and numbers to drive meaningful change in various aspects of life, from entertainment to social issues.
excerpt: To "Vote With Your Feet," one must think strategically, act tactically, use tools creatively, generate diversity, and share generously. This approach combines big-picture thinking with practical action, encouraging innovative problem-solving and promoting inclusivity.
